column5: Want to stay in the coolest part of Austin? Please check out our apartment! A lovely and private space at treetop level. Private entrance, covered outdoor porch, large interior space, high ceilings, tons of light from tall windows on all sides. Conveniently located in Zilker/SoLa, one of the best areas of Austin. Walking distance from great restaurants, bars, excellent coffee, shops, Zilker park, Barton Springs.
column8: Charming Tower of Light in Austin
